mapper.select: SELECT rlff.ID_RLFF as 'IdRlf',rct.CODE_RCT as 'EmployeeCode',rct.NAME_RCT as 'EmployeeName',rlff.MONTH as 'Month',rlff.YEAR as 'Year',tem.NAME_TEM as 'Team',rct.HEAD_QUARTER_RCT as 'Headquarter', rct.EMAIL_AM as 'EmailAM',rct.EMAIL_RM as 'EmailRM',rlff.ISBLOCK as 'IsBockedFF', rlff.ISVALIDATED as 'IsValidated',rlff.ISEXPIRED as 'IsExpired',rlff.ISREJECTED as 'IsRejected',rlff.REASON as 'Reason', rlff.REMARK as 'Remark',rlff.ADMIN_REMARK_RLFF as 'RemarkByAdmin',rlff.BATCH_NO_RLFF as 'BatchNo',rlff.MATERIAL_CODE_RLFF as 'MaterialCode' FROM RECOMMENDED_LIST_FORBLOCK_FF_RLFF rlff join RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT rct on rlff.EMPLOYEE_CODE_RLFF = rct.CODE_RCT join TEAM_MASTER_TEM tem on rct.ID_TEM_RCT = tem.ID_TEM join TEAM_LEGAL_ENTITY_TET tet on tem.ID_TEM = tet.ID_TEM_TET where rlff.MONTH = #{month} and rlff.YEAR = #{year} and rlff.ISBLOCK = 1

SELECT rlff.ID_RLFF as 'IdRlf',rct.CODE_RCT as 'EmployeeCode',rct.NAME_RCT as 'EmployeeName',rlff.MONTH as 'Month',rlff.YEAR as 'Year',tem.NAME_TEM as 'Team',rct.HEAD_QUARTER_RCT as 'Headquarter', rct.EMAIL_AM as 'EmailAM',rct.EMAIL_RM as 'EmailRM',rlff.ISBLOCK as 'IsBockedFF', rlff.ISVALIDATED as 'IsValidated',rlff.ISEXPIRED as 'IsExpired',rlff.ISREJECTED as 'IsRejected',rlff.REASON as 'Reason', rlff.REMARK as 'Remark',rlff.ADMIN_REMARK_RLFF as 'RemarkByAdmin',rlff.BATCH_NO_RLFF as 'BatchNo',rlff.MATERIAL_CODE_RLFF as 'MaterialCode' FROM RECOMMENDED_LIST_FORBLOCK_FF_RLFF rlff join RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT rct on rlff.EMPLOYEE_CODE_RLFF = rct.CODE_RCT join TEAM_MASTER_TEM tem on rct.ID_TEM_RCT = tem.ID_TEM join TEAM_LEGAL_ENTITY_TET tet on tem.ID_TEM = tet.ID_TEM_TET where rlff.MONTH = #{month} and rlff.YEAR = #{year} and rlff.ISBLOCK = 0

SELECT rlff.ID_RLFF as 'IdRlf',rct.CODE_RCT as 'EmployeeCode',rct.NAME_RCT as 'EmployeeName',rlff.MONTH as 'Month',rlff.YEAR as 'Year',tem.NAME_TEM as 'Team',rct.HEAD_QUARTER_RCT as 'Headquarter', rct.EMAIL_AM as 'EmailAM',rct.EMAIL_RM as 'EmailRM',rlff.ISBLOCK as 'IsBockedFF', rlff.ISVALIDATED as 'IsValidated',rlff.ISEXPIRED as 'IsExpired',rlff.ISREJECTED as 'IsRejected',rlff.REASON as 'Reason', rlff.REMARK as 'Remark',rlff.ADMIN_REMARK_RLFF as 'RemarkByAdmin',rlff.BATCH_NO_RLFF as 'BatchNo',rlff.MATERIAL_CODE_RLFF as 'MaterialCode' FROM RECOMMENDED_LIST_FORBLOCK_FF_RLFF rlff join RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT rct on rlff.EMPLOYEE_CODE_RLFF = rct.CODE_RCT join TEAM_MASTER_TEM tem on rct.ID_TEM_RCT = tem.ID_TEM join TEAM_LEGAL_ENTITY_TET tet on tem.ID_TEM = tet.ID_TEM_TET where rlff.MONTH = #{month} and rlff.YEAR = #{year} and rlff.ISREJECTED = 1
{ call Get_SampleNearExpiryCount (#{month, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{year, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
{ call Get_InputsNearExpiryCount (#{month, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{year, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
{ call Get_OptimaLogsdata (#{month, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{year, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} , #{type, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
{ call PROC_GET_BLOCKED_LIST ( #{year, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
SELECT ID_USR,NAME_USR,EMAIL_ADDRESS_USR FROM USER_MASTER_USR WHERE ID_DESG_ULV_USR = '24720986-A3EE-4DCA-9538-36F52625EB70' AND ID_STATUS_SLV_USR = '1D2F12F3-F84A-4200-9590-70680528779B'
{ call GET_BU_FOR_BUC ( #{usr, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
{ call GET_COMPLIANCE_DETAILS_LIST ( #{usr, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} , #{FromDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} , #{ToDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPLIANCE_DETAILS_CD SET REMARKS = #{remark} WHERE ID_CM = #{id}
UPDATE COMPLIANCE_DETAILS_CD SET REASON = #{reason} WHERE ID_CM = #{id}
